td.content: s:patient presents with progressive severe strange behavior, severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet and Mental Health for past 6 days. she is a 54 YO white F foreman. o:Height 65 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Urine toxicology.

s:pt with C/O Heart for 3 days that is frequent. she is a female foreman aged 54 Ys. pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily she reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 65 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

td.content: s:pt reports severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet. Also complains of severe strange behavior from time to time. she is a white F foreman aged 55 Ys. she has a history of smoking Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 65 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 17 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg at bedtime.
